name: Idle City of the not Unliving
name_original: Idle City of the not Unliving
description:
This is an idle clicker game with two lists of hirelings.

Made for Ludum Dare  46 - Keep It Alive

Instructions:

Click on the city to get free gold.

Click Supply or Guard to choose from which list you wish to hire by spending gold.

Suppliers provide the city's necessities and give you gold periodically. You will need more as the city grows!

Guards provide protection from the ghosts below. You will need more and more to address the growing ghost population.

When all your guards are dead the suppliers are attacked next, and that quickly drops the Supply Surplus causing a game over.

Higher rank hirelings are somehow better, but cost a lot more.

Hire the best Guard or best Supplier to win.

Idle City of the not Unliving - because double negatives are not unconfusing!

source.zip contains all the game's source code. Extract to a directory and import it to Godot  (version 3.2.1)
